derivation.yuyuan_name: early 17th cent. (in the sense 'overtaken by darkness'): past participle of obsolete belate 'delay' (see be-, late)

entry.tran: 迟来的；延误的；姗姗来迟的
entry.def: A belated action happens later than it should have done.

sentences.en: They made a belated attempt to save her life.
sentences.cn: 他们力图挽救她的生命,可是已经太迟了。

sentences.en: The award is being made in belated recognition of her services to the industry.
